stable.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
stable.bodyMarkdown:
### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`7b25a84`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/7b25a84c08d3b1903814a99c5a32f20dca33729e) - **shizuku**: crash when processing +~1MB thumbnail files *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`0558f98`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0558f98b2b67dd7aba9e3178fc43ae7b9966a2fa) - **shizuku**: automatically create non-existing directories *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

# v1.8.1
### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`ecfe326`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ecfe326b76499b42376eb8190d6c5068d9b51dd4) - support Android 5.0 (previously only supported 5.1) *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

# v1.8.0
### ‚ú® New Features
- [`73a321f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/73a321f7cab26f8ea689ef942a54527a969bf1d6) - add support for Android 5.0 *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`d3bb609`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/d3bb6096c1eae2dccbf085baeef238ed681f2594) - **settings/about**: redesign credits & add libraries *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`32dec82`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/32dec8275f44cde913ab80419a0310178ded0b13) - predictive back gesture support *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`d26e4a8`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/d26e4a848ca5f40ea4e5351f6eeb43aa49550c87) - **settings/about**: add option to copy debug info *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`119e590`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/119e590c27ceaec8c06cd7ebe0055aa1bde37435) - **l10n**: update translations *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`13f87ba`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/13f87ba5d47802f2678c25577e326d3c1cbe12d8) - **l10n**: hide on Android 6 and below as it has no effect *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`52639bd`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/52639bd88c4cb6c087288ffc2066dac91a18ada1) - navigation bar contrast on Android 6.0 *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`a9f28ff`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/a9f28ff3a2eb3d3cfcaf82349d02b15ea8702356) - adjust navigation transitions *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

preRelease.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon

### üêõ Bug Fixes
